Sentencas: The present study deals with modelling and validation of a planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) design fuelled by gas mixture of partially pre-reformed methane.
Titulo: COMPUTATIONAL FLUID DYNAMICS CALCULATION OF A PLANAR SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELL DESIGN RUNNING ON SYNGAS

Sentencas: A 3D model was developed using the ANSYS Fluent Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) tool that was supported by an additional Fuel Cell Tools module.
Titulo: COMPUTATIONAL FLUID DYNAMICS CALCULATION OF A PLANAR SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELL DESIGN RUNNING ON SYNGAS

Sentencas: The governing equations for momentum, heat, gas species, ion and electron transport were implemented and coupled to kinetics describing the electrochemical and reforming reactions.
Titulo: COMPUTATIONAL FLUID DYNAMICS CALCULATION OF A PLANAR SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELL DESIGN RUNNING ON SYNGAS

Sentencas: In the model, the Water Gas Shift reaction in a porous anode layer was included.
Titulo: COMPUTATIONAL FLUID DYNAMICS CALCULATION OF A PLANAR SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELL DESIGN RUNNING ON SYNGAS

Sentencas: Electrochemical oxidation of hydrogen and carbon monoxide fuels were both considered.
Titulo: COMPUTATIONAL FLUID DYNAMICS CALCULATION OF A PLANAR SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELL DESIGN RUNNING ON SYNGAS

Sentencas: The developed model enabled to predict the distributions of temperature, current density and gas flow in the fuel cell.
Titulo: COMPUTATIONAL FLUID DYNAMICS CALCULATION OF A PLANAR SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELL DESIGN RUNNING ON SYNGAS
